translation: Tohụ̄ kriv ʿrẓ zi bh chuhs (aakhi) dhmakh sintụ̄ sytthah tyzy san (kaynat) vjvds mnz aann vạlis rb sund pnah mngan.
Pth tamhi chyzkh shr (th nqṣan) nishhi yus tmụ̄ pạd chuh kormut.
Th (khaṣ pạtthụ̄) aanhi gttụ̄ rạcz hndishr nishhi yylhi (tamiyuk) aanhi gott ṭạry spdi.
Byyhi gnddn mnz phokh dinh vajinyn jvdgrụ̄nyn (th jvdgrn) hndi shr nishhi.
Byyhi pth ḥsd krn vạlụ̄ sndi shr nishhi yylhi suh ḥsd kri.
